snippet: Regulators in the United States and Germany said they were investigating some gas-powered Audis that shifted differently during tests, deepening Volkswagen’s woes....
abstract: Volkswagen admits United States and German regulators are investigating reasons some Audi luxury cars and sport utility vehicles behaved differently during tests than they did on road, broadening emissions investigation and raising suspicion that company used new type of software to evade regulation.
lead_paragraph: Regulators in the United States and Germany said they were investigating some gas-powered Audis that shifted differently during tests, deepening Volkswagen’s woes.

headline.main: New Type of Emissions Cheating Software May Lurk in Audis
headline.print_headline: New Type of Emissions Cheating Is Cited in Audis
